meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive John Overholt Ann Kruger Eric Floyd Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4118.

td.p: John Overholt, a librarian from Austin, Texas
Ann Kruger, a college counselor originally from Linden, New Jersey
Eric Floyd, a college student from Calhoun, Georgia (whose 4-day cash winnings total $97,800)

td.a: Smithsonian National Air and Space Museum

tr.td: I'M NOT PRESIDENT BECAUSE OF YOU
DOUBLE TALK ROCK
CANALS
"SH"!
BE VEWY, VEWY QUIET

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Eric: What is the Pacific Ocean?)

the Atlantic

EricAnn
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Sofia of the Clue Crew reports from the Air & Space Museum.) The Lockheed Vega 5B displayed here carried Amelia Earhart on the first solo flight by a woman that crossed this body of water')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Sofia of the Clue Crew reports from the Air & Space Museum.) The Lockheed Vega 5B displayed here carried Amelia Earhart on the first solo flight by a woman that crossed this body of water

John

toggle('clue_J_6_1', 'clue_J_6_1_stuck', '(John selected the category with an imitation of [*].)

Elmer Fudd

Eric
')

The National Air Museum

AnnJohn
')

div.onmouseover:

(Ann: What is El Paso?)
[Alex did not say, "No harm, no foul."]

Houston

EricAnnJohn
Triple Stumper
')

toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: Interestingly enough, "What is England?" would have been acceptable also because they too were invaded by a Germanic tribe, the Angles.)

$15,100
JohnWhat is France?
$0
France (or England)')

(including 3 DDs),

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
